name: CalculaCore
description:
CalculaCore

Count A Basic Math !

Sometimes It's Hard To Multiply 142857 By 7 In Mind , Or Dividing 51 By 3 , Or Even Adding 78 To 446 . .

That's Why CalculaCore Should Be On Your Side !

You Can Calculate Some Easy Equation Which Sometimes Makes Your Work A Bit Easier !

May Work As An Replacement For Your Boring Default Calculator , Enjoy Satisfying Clicks And Sound Effects Mixed With Pixel Art !

Isn't It Just A Normal Calculator ?

Well , Yes . . Or Is It ?

It Currently Contains 2 Fun :

  • Type Bell (7738) To Makes The CalculaCore Plays Short Music .
  • Type Number Of The Beast . .
    • Happy Calculating !
